qualifiedSingularNounPhrase(anyPlural)grammar

en_us.t[5772]

Superclass
Tree

Property
Summary

Method
Summary

Property
Details

Method
Details

A singular qualified noun phrase that arbitrarily selects from a plural set. This is singular, even though the underlying noun phrase is plural, because we’re explicitly selecting one item.

grammar qualifiedSingularNounPhrase(anyPlural) :   ArbitraryNounProd
